title.rendered: Alrosa Airlines Office Address | Phone | Email

content.rendered:
ALROSA Airlines is a Russian airline that carries out regional transportation in Yakutia, regular and charter flights in Russia, international charter flights to the CIS countries, Asia and Europe, cargo transportation and special aviation operations. Based at Mirny and Domodedovo airports.

 

Alrosa Airlines in Mirny, Russia Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address : Russia, 678170, Mirny, airport administration building, office 24

Phone: +7 (41136) 4-81-21, 4-81-60

Fax: +7 (41136) 4-81-21

Email: avia-info@aero.alrosa.ru

Business hours: Mon-Fri: 08:00 – 18:00, Sat-Sun: closed

Alrosa Airlines Official Website: https://www.alrosa.aero/

Alrosa Airlines Online Check-in: https://booking.alrosa.aero/web-chekin/

Note: Online check-in is available 24 hours and closes 2 hours before scheduled time of departure.

Check Alrosa Airlines schedule here: https://booking.alrosa.aero/websky/#/schedule

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Alrosa Airlines

Total fleet: 06

  • Boeing 737-700
  • Boeing 737-800
  • Irkut MC-21-300
  • Superjet 100

Alrosa Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Alrosa Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Alrosa Airlines

Traveling with Pets in Alrosa Airlines

  • Adult passengers are allowed to carry pets.
  • A passenger traveling with an animal must have and present at check-in valid documents (certificates) on the health of the animal, issued by the competent authorities in the field of veterinary medicine.

For more details: https://www.alrosa.aero/info/transportation-of-an-animal-in-the-next-seat-in-the-cabin-of-the-aircraft

View list of all Alrosa Airlines Offices

Queries handled by Alrosa Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Diamond Mile

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Alrosa Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Alrosa Airlines : (click on the stars below)
